title: Jhin release date?
body: I am so excited to play jhin but dont have a chance at trying him right now because i dont have a PBE account i was wondering how much longer until jhin comes out on live?

replies.body: how much will the bundle pack cost on him ?? cuz i want to buy and i have the moneys ready so..

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} > [{quoted}](name=OjehxZ,realm=EUW,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=pdEUzP31,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-26T18:26:33.648+0000)
>
> how much will the bundle pack cost on him ?? cuz i want to buy and i have the moneys ready so..

less than 1350 i believe since that was how much kindred pack was when it came out, so pretty cheap since its cheaper than the skin itself
PBE operates in a two week cycle along with the patches.
2 weeks, since he came onto the pbe last week I'm guessing sometime next week?
